memberdef.name: d3derr
memberdef.initializer: do \ { \ bool res = (c); \ G_ANALYSIS_ASSUME(res); \ if (!res) \ { \ bool canReset; \ if (dagor_d3d_force_driver_reset || d3d::device_lost(&canReset)) \ d3derr_in_device_reset(m); \ else \ DAG_FATAL("%s:\n%s", m, d3d::get_last_error()); \ } \ } while (0)

memberdef.definition: typedef intptr_t main_wnd_f(void *, unsigned, uintptr_t, intptr_t)
memberdef.name: main_wnd_f
